Text: In a bid to ensure stability in the foreign exchange market, the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) injected $210.0 million into the interbank segment following sales concluded on Tuesday.
Cause: In a bid to ensure stability in the foreign exchange market
Effect: the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) injected $210.0 million into the interbank segment following sales concluded on Tuesday.
Sentence: <e1>In a bid to ensure stability in the foreign exchange market</e1>, <e2>the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) injected $210.0 million into the interbank segment following sales concluded on Tuesday.</e2>
